title: Dagger of Shar
content:
Dagger of Shar Uncommon 2~8 Damage 1d4 Piercing+1d4 Necrotic (Conditional) Grip of Shadows: Deals an additional 1-6 Necrotic damage if the target is not standing in sunlight. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The dagger's handle is smooth and light, its jagged blade sharpened into a thin, cruel edge. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 270

1d4 Piercing+1d4 Necrotic (Conditional)

Grip of Shadows: Deals an additional 1-6 Necrotic damage if the target is not standing in sunlight.

Proficien
